TestCase.Title: Check if the ePassport is BAC protected
TestCase.Purpose: Try to identifying if the connected ePassport is a protected BAC ePassport

Precondition.Text: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed

Command.Text: Select the ePassport application with a plain SelectApplication APDU
Read first byte of EF.DG2 from ePassport

TestStep.Description: Send read binary command to read first byte of EF.DG2. First byte must be '75'

ExpectedResult.TechnicalResult: assertStatusWord(new Array("9000"), card.SW.toString(HEX), FAILURE); assertMatchValue("75 90 00", dg2, FAILURE);
